review:
i enjoyed aaja nachle.    it was interesting and entertaining.  dont know why it failed commercially.

i watched this film on amazon prime.  the main draw to see this movie was the  recurring o re piya theme song, beautifully rendered by rahat fa khan.  i was pleasantly surprised to find the plot quite good, the movie was interesting with  a good production.  madhuri and all the cast essayed their roles very well.  some big names there : madhuri, konkona, even irffan khan and nawazuddin, akshaye khanna.

overall, aaja nachle is a very watchable film.   just goes to show that one should not blindly go by negative reviews.

i loved this movie alot! the best thing about this was that even tho diya wasn't sure about the show, she didn't reveal that to her team. she kept going and didn't stop. and at the end it resulted in immense happiness and joy for entire shamli! ❤ the positivity in the movie made me immensely fascinated! 😊 loved it!

oh my god. i watched the movie in 2019 at the recommendation of my friend and wow...i m so glad.. i didn't know it showcases madhuri s talent so well and i loved the flow with which the movie moves. being a theatre artist it adds to the charm of the movie for me. loved it ❤️

it was a very interesting and engaging movie. i would certainly recommend it to people who have not watched this movie. this movie teaches us a lot about life, forgiveness, friendship and value of relationships.
a very good movie. good storyline and acting, beautiful song. don’t know why it was not a success in box office.
aaja nachle song are my fevret. madhuri mams dance owesome. i love did ,can you teach me.
super dance aaja nachle nachle meri yartu nachle song fantastic romantic wonderful dance thank you madhuri dixit medam visiting again very nice song
i love ur dance mam and i usually dance ur songs in any function thanks alot for inspiring me

it makes me proud as an  indian .after all it's about indian classical dance and ajanta.
